pages.name: Hint #6
pages.text: In misty marsh where ruins lie, a relic waits, low and sly. Through muddy depths, your path may stray, the frog's visage guides the way.$(br)$(br)See the next page for the answer.

pages.title: Answer #6
pages.text: Find a frog mask hidden beneath the swamp ruins. A frog mask will always generate in suspicious sand hidden within the structure.

pages.title: Answer #6
pages.text: A brush will be required to retrieve the mask from suspicious sand.$(br)
